answers.answer: I was induced with my daughter and everyone kept telling me it made the contractions worse and increased my chances of having to have a c section and would make my labor last longer than normal. All LIES! I am a huge wimp and I didn't even notice my contractions until I was 6-7 cm dilated. I was only in labor 4 1/2 hours and I delivered vaginally. I also did all of that with no medications. Sex also brings on labor. Oh and if you have a labor/yoga ball bouncing on that will help out too.

I was also induced and my friend today as well. Our labors were both the exact same time length (8 hours) and it was really not that bad at all! I got an epidural at 5cm but that was mainly because I was bed stricken (had severe preeclampsia and group strep b so had a cathedar in and on medicine thru an iv to prevent seizures and antibiotics since i had group b strep lol) I really do think I could have sucked it up and went longer if I would have been able to get out of bed. Its really not bad at all. Dont stress about it :) good luck and early congrats!
Thank u girls I hope the process is not long .

question: Im 40+2days and getting induced on friday :( im nervous .. any of u have experience an induction ? What is it like? .... also im trying to go in labor by my own but I dont trust any home remedies to bring on labor .. im just walking, doing sit ups and warm baths but im tired of walking my lower abdomen hurts its like a  constant pain and once in a while some sharp pains by my hips or back
title: overdue!!! :(
